author: hustla187
title: ME WANT COOOOOOKIIEEEEEEESSSSS!!
review: Lego made a clever tool to make cookies that look like Lego bricks. I like the idea of it rolling along and making some cookies before it goes in the oven. As I am typing up this review, I am very hungry for some cookies(At least I have Oreos near by) and I probably eat some after I'm done. Overall, this is a great kitchen tool for the Lego fan.
